title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 626.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 626.1 - General

State Regulations

If not in conflict with the standards here established, the procedures and other implementations which apply to training, subsistence, and transportation allowances under the Federal Manpower Development and

Training Act shall also apply in the administration of such allowances pursuant
to the provisions of article 23-A of the Labor Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
626.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
